title: Add complete French (fr) and German (de) UI translation packs

requirements.text: Create a complete French (fr) UI translation pack by replacing the current `fr: commonTranslations` fallback with an explicit French dictionary in `frontend/src/lib/translations.ts` (i.e., provide French values for all keys currently present in `commonTranslations`, preserving any emojis/icons where they exist).
acceptanceCriteria: `frontend/src/lib/translations.ts` contains a `fr` entry with explicit French values for every key in `commonTranslations` (no spreading of `commonTranslations` for `fr`).
All existing keys in `commonTranslations` are present in `translations.fr` and translated to French.
Existing emojis/symbols (e.g., üéâ, ‚û°Ô∏è, ‚ö°) remain present in the French strings where they exist in `commonTranslations`.
No non-French languages are modified except as necessary to add the explicit `fr` dictionary.

requirements.text: Create a complete German (de) UI translation pack by replacing the current `de: commonTranslations` fallback with an explicit German dictionary in `frontend/src/lib/translations.ts` (i.e., provide German values for all keys currently present in `commonTranslations`, preserving any emojis/icons where they exist).
acceptanceCriteria: `frontend/src/lib/translations.ts` contains a `de` entry with explicit German values for every key in `commonTranslations` (no spreading of `commonTranslations` for `de`).
All existing keys in `commonTranslations` are present in `translations.de` and translated to German.
Existing emojis/symbols (e.g., üéâ, ‚û°Ô∏è, ‚ö°) remain present in the German strings where they exist in `commonTranslations`.
No non-German languages are modified except as necessary to add the explicit `de` dictionary.

constraints: Use English for any user-facing text in this build request.
Do not edit any files under `frontend/src/components/ui` or other paths listed in `frontend.immutablePaths`.
Keep all translations limited to keys that already exist in `commonTranslations` (do not add/remove translation keys as part of this change).
nonGoals: Adding new languages beyond French (fr) and German (de).
Changing the language selector UI or language persistence behavior.
Adding/expanding localized fallback quiz question pools beyond the existing Turkish/English fallback data.
